name: 張康聰
objective:
Designed for doctoral students, this seminar consists of three components. The first component covers the basics of scientific writing. We will use Michael Alley’s popular book on scientific writing for discussions. The second component examines the organization and writing of select articles from indexed journals that correspond to students’ research interest. The third component lets the student prepare a manuscript and submit it to an indexed journal. 　　
本課程專為博士班研究生設計，課程內容由三個部份組成。第一個組成部分包括科學寫作的基礎，將使用Michael Alley有關科學寫作著名的書籍進行討論。第二個組成部分為依據學生研究的興趣與研究主軸，選擇具指標性的學術文獻，探討其研究架構及寫作技巧。第三個組成部分為讓學生進行論文寫作，並作為投稿具指標性學術論文之準備。

scorePolicy: The course requirements include weekly reading or writing assignments. Grading: exercises 40%, term manuscript 40%, class participation 20%.

Robert A. Day and Barbara Gastel. 2006. How to Write and Publish a Scientific Paper, 6th ed. (Westport, CONN: Greenwood Press).
